 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְבֵּן‎</span> **noun [masculine]** 

**1.** ==brick-mould==; 

**2.** ==quadrangle== (on meaning ***brick-mould***, and figurative something ***rectangular***, see [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]]<sup>ZAW 1882, 53-72</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[2Sam.12.31|2Sam 12:31]]</sup>, compare Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלְבֵּן‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**1.** ***brick-mould***, [[2Sam.12.31|2Sam 12:31]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]], by error, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מלכן‎</span>), [[Nah.3.14|Nah 3:14]]. 

**2.** ***quadrangle***, [[Jer.43.9|Jer 43:9]] (at Tahpanhes).
